211enum hwloc_location_type_e {
213 HWLOC_LOCATION_TYPE_CPUSET = 1,
215 HWLOC_LOCATION_TYPE_OBJECT = 0
216};
217
219struct hwloc_location {
221 enum hwloc_location_type_e type;
223 union hwloc_location_u {
225 hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset;
227 hwloc_obj_t object;
228 } location;
229};

HWLOC_MEMATTR_ID_LOCALITY
@ HWLOC_MEMATTR_ID_LOCALITY
The "Locality" is returned as the number of PUs in that locality (e.g. the weight of its cpuset).
